import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Row, Col, Image, } from 'react-bootstrap'; const DISC_ICON = require('../../../assets/images/home/disconnected-icon.png'); const CONN_ICON = require('../../../assets/images/home/connected-icon.png'); const PROFILE_PHOTO = require('../../../assets/images/home/profile-photo.png'); const INSTA_ICON = require('../../../assets/images/home/insta-icon.png'); export default function PageCard(props) { const fbHost = "https://graph.facebook.com" useEffect(() => { axios.get(`${fbHost}/${props.idPage}/?fields=fan_count,picture,new_like_count,likes,general_info,country_page_likes&access_token=${props.accessToken}`) .then(res => console.log("page card ", res.data)) .catch(err => console.log("page card err", err)) }, []) return ( /* if clicked border: 1px solid red; */
